Implements a toggled ability that allows you to {{rules|drag things along the ground without picking them up}}, although doing so {{rules|takes a lot of time}}. Can be freely enabled or disabled in existing saves, but requires a save reload.
{{W|Disabled:}} Disable the item hauling system. {{W|Cached:}} You haul only objects that were beneath you when you started hauling. Moving over new ones won't include them. {{W|All:}} You haul all objects beneath you, even if they weren't present when you started.
